data.title: Coalition Careers, Jobs, and Salary Information - Ladders
data.snippet:
Coalition is a UK-based financial technology company that provides risk management and analytics solutions to financial institutions. The company was founded in 2008 and has since grown to become a leading provider of risk management software, with clients including some of the world's largest banks and asset managers. Coalition's technology platform allows financial institutions to monitor and manage their risk exposure in real-time, providing insights into market trends and potential risks. The company has received numerous awards for its innovative approach to risk management, including the Risk Management Technology Provider of the Year at the Risk Awards in 2019.

data.title: Behind the Scenes: A Glimpse Into Coalition's Engineering Team
data.snippet: configurable platform to offer insurance such that we can add new lines of insurance go to new geographies do that with ease and be able to go very quickly into new parts of the market one of the unique things about coalition is the data we have we collect this large amount of information about almost every company in the united states how do we take that data and turn it into actionable quantitative insights on making sure mom and pop businesses reduce their chances of getting hacked and use that data along with our knowledge of what that means in terms of risk to an organization and use that to really price that risk in a unique way we have a set of principles that we really believe define who we are as an organization humility authenticity being responsible for the things that they own [...] authenticity being responsible for the things that they own at the company and also putting the team first we're unique we have differences we have a culture that celebrates those it's inclusive and we want everybody to feel like this is a place that they want to be for the long term it's about trying to create a sense of culture even though we're not physically together most of the time so the type of people that will be most successful at coalition are first and foremost self-starters they're the people that wants to go solve hard technical problems they relish that challenge coalition is a wonderful place for people who like making an impact bold and yet humble and collaborative at the same time and i think that underlies our culture and is in everyone at coalition our coalition our [...] the most important things a new team member can look forward to would kind of be thrown into this intersection of technical experts insurance experts and cyber security experts everyone is so willing to help you grow and learn about new technologies what that does is really create a lot of opportunity for everybody that joins coalition to have a bigger and bigger impact they get to be a part of a really exciting journey on a really fast growing company and a rocket ship get ready to start working on some pretty high impact higher intensity problems the technical problems we're solving at coalition really fall into three main areas the first is what we like to call insurance in a box the idea that we're going to have a generic data.title: Coalition Inc. Careers | Our Current Job Opportunities
data.snippet:
#### Can I use AI to apply or during the interview?

We embrace AI across everything we do, including the candidate experience. You’re welcome to use AI tools to refine your résumé or prepare for interviews, but we want to get to know you. Please make sure your application and interview answers reflect your own experience, skills, and voice. If responses don’t feel personal or authentic, it makes it harder for us to evaluate your fit.

For technical interviews, we encourage candidates to embrace AI when it makes sense. Your interview team will tell you which parts of the process allow AI use and which parts are meant to show your own skills and problem-solving approach.

#### What can I expect during the interview process, and who will I meet? [...] Innovative security tools and services; expert guidance and insights on cyber threats.

SECURITY TOOLS & RESOURCES [...] #### What should I include in my application?

Focus on your most relevant experience, skills, and accomplishments. Use specific examples with measurable results that show your impact, leadership, collaboration, or innovation.

Definitely upload a résumé and create a profile. We use an applicant tracking system called Greenhouse to manage our hiring process. Creating a profile lets you track your application, and uploading your résumé helps us quickly understand your qualifications.
